node.name: nWire for PHP - Code Exploration & Visualization
node.shortdescription:
nWire for PHP: Code Exploration for Eclipse

Visualize and understand the application components and associations.
Find your way through the most complex code
Focus on coding, maximize your productivity.

Watch this short intro video that will change the way you navigate your code.

nWire presents an innovative approach to code exploration. It analyzes the code and provides the several unique tools:

  • A navigator which presents all possible associations for a given point in the code in an easy to browse view.
  • A quick search for every component, including methods and fields, without opening a single dialog box.
  • A visualizer which presents the architecture graphically.

nWire assists and expedites the coding process. It is extremely useful when it comes to understanding code. It is the perfect tool for developers who get lost in big systems, thus has the potential of reducing the learning curve for new developers. It can cut development costs, especially in medium to large development teams, working on complex applications.

Download nWire for a free, 30 day fully functional trial today.
